input.sentences: i stopped by a small town on my road trip .
there were a lot of unique items available .
i bought some souvenirs while i was there .
i stopped to watch the trains go by before heading on my way .
output.sentences: On our vacation we recently stopped in a small town.
The small town had lots of unique shops.
We found a great place to buy souvenirs and bought one for everyone at work.
We found a great place to buy used/old wood for our crafts.
During our tour of the town we found a great place to stop and watch the trains go by.
